divs: Sighting Detailsi was leaving for work,ihad just let my dog shannon out she started barking about something.i looked around i looked up then i saw it i knew it did not belong .it was round it had about 5 cloured lights,it looked silver.it just stayed right up in the sky.then a plane came in from the north and the ufo just shot off very fast the plane chased it.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in McKeesport
There was one other sighting in McKeesport on or around July 25th 2004
Summary: round silver with about 5 differant lights
